methods.name: public FmBandConfig build()
methods.comment:
* Combines all of the parameters that have been set and return a new
             * {@link FmBandConfig} object.
             * @return a new {@link FmBandConfig} object

methods.name: public Builder setStereo(boolean state)
methods.comment:
* Set stereo enable state
             * @param state The new enable state.
             * @return the same Builder instance.

methods.name: public Builder setRds(boolean state)
methods.comment:
* Set RDS or RBDS(if region is ITU2) enable state
             * @param state The new enable state.
             * @return the same Builder instance.

methods.name: public Builder setTa(boolean state)
methods.comment:
* Set Traffic announcement enable state
             * @param state The new enable state.
             * @return the same Builder instance.

methods.name: public Builder setAf(boolean state)
methods.comment:
* Set Alternate Frequency Switching enable state
             * @param state The new enable state.
             * @return the same Builder instance.

methods.name: public Builder setEa(boolean state)
methods.comment:
* Set Emergency Announcement enable state
             * @param state The new enable state.
             * @return the same Builder instance.
